body: These sandals are woven from grass, lengths of pliant vine, living leaves, and supple bark. In forest terrain, the wearer leaves no tracks or scent and gains a +2 competence bonus on Stealth checks. The wearer can move through natural undergrowth without impediment or harm as a druid using woodland stride , and once per day she may step inside a tree and remain there for up to 9 hours, or teleport to a similar tree within range, as tree stride but allowing only a single teleport.
name: Dryad Sandals
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Feet/Feet Slot Wondrous Items/Dryad Sandals
